name: variablechecker
description: Simple helper to do variable checks and keep complexity low

scripts.tag: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && git tag v$PACKAGE_VERSION && git push --tags
scripts.getName: echo ::set-output name=PACKAGE_NAME::$(cat package.json | grep name | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]')
scripts.getVersion: echo ::set-output name=PACKAGE_VERSION::$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]')

author: Bernhard Maier <mail@bernhard-maier.net> (bernhard-maier.net)
